parameters.name: ADAccountName
parameters.description: The account of the AD domain.

parameters.name: ADDNS
parameters.description: The DNS information about the AD domain.

parameters.name: ADPassword
parameters.description: The password for the account of the AD domain.

parameters.name: ADServerIpAddress
parameters.description: The IP address of the AD domain.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.
